mapper.insert: insert into reserve_good (reserve_id, image_url, good_name, good_desc, create_time, max_count, unit, reserve_finish_time, delivery_time, pick_address, delivery_type, attention, delivery_money, sell_out_count, good_price, market_price, publish_phone) values (#{reserveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{maxCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pickAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellOutCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{publishPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update reserve_good set image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, good_name = #{goodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, good_desc = #{goodDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, max_count = #{maxCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve_finish_time = #{reserveFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pick_address = #{pickAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_type = #{deliveryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attention = #{attention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_money = #{deliveryMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sell_out_count = #{sellOutCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, good_price = #{goodPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, publish_phone = #{publishPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where reserve_id = #{reserveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select reserve_id, image_url, good_name, good_desc, create_time, max_count, unit, reserve_finish_time, delivery_time, pick_address, delivery_type, attention, delivery_money, sell_out_count, good_price, market_price, publish_phone from reserve_good where reserve_id = #{reserveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
